overdo.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to do something more than is suitable or natural
overdo.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Analysts believe that worries about the economy are overdone.
Use a few drawings and photographs, but donâ€™t overdo it.
overdo.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to use too much of something
overdo.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I think I overdid the salt.
